summary:
Keep finding your mannequins neked every time you come home?
What do they get up to when you\'re out??

This is a replacer for the vanilla mannequin script to ensure your mannies get dressed when you enter!
descriptionHtml:
Another Mannequin Script Fix V.1.0

Keep finding your mannequins neked every time you come home?
What do they get up to when you\'re out??

This is a replacer for the vanilla mannequin script to ensure your mannies get dressed when you enter!
It has a 2 second delay to ensure the house is fully loaded before being triggered to move them to their specified location and re-dress!

This script does not offer alternate mannequin types, extra poses or any other bells and whistles, it just makes sure your mannies get dressed!
If you are after more options I suggest [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10652/?]SLuckyD\'s Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix[/url]

To install using NMM: (Recommended)
Clear your mannequins of armour, exit the house, save and quit then download and install this script with NMM then reload/continue but stay away from the house(s) for at least 3-4 game days for the game to flush the original script then go home and re-dress you mannies.

To uninstall using NMM:
Clear your mannequins of armour, exit the house, save and quit then un-install this script using NMM, reload/continue but stay away from the house(s) for at least 3-4 game days for the game to flush this replacement script then go home and re-dress you mannies.

To install by hand:
Clear your mannequins of armour, exit the house, save and quit then manual download the 7zip, locate it in your downloads folder and unpack to your Skyrim install folder and click \"Yes\" to overwrite, this will merge the data/scripts/source folders. Reload/continue but stay away from the house(s) for at least 3-4 game days for the game to flush the original script then go home and re-dress you mannies.

To uninstall by hand:
Navigate to your Skyrim install folder and delete the files MannequinActivatorSCRIPT.pex from Data/Scripts & MannequinActivatorSCRIPT.psc from Data/Scripts/Source. Reload/continue but stay away from the house(s) for at least 3-4 game days for the game to flush this replacement script then go home and re-dress you mannies.

berticus0001

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Other Mods By Me!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33219/?]Gypsy Eyes Caravan[/url]
For the wandering adventurer, the player home you can take with you!!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8922]Berts Breezehome Remodeled[/url]
A full remodel of Breezehome including interior, exterior and cellar & so much more!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15801]Berts Breezehome Cellar[/url]
Adds an open (no loadscreen) cellar to Breezehome with a full set of crafting and smithing tools plus displays for armour, weapons, dragon masks and dragon claws!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15806]Berts Breezehome Garden[/url]
A new garden grotto added to Whiterun available as a standalone or connected to the vanilla Breezehome & is also pre-packed with my Cellar & Remodeled mods.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29942/]Berts Breezehome Greenhouse[/url]
A stand-alone version of the greenhouse thats included with this mod (Berts Breezehome Remodel) & Berts Breezehome Cellar.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29665]Remo\'s Display Spells[/url]
A collection of spells aimed specifically at making your house a home.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25239/#]Berts Hearthfire Dairy Goods Upgrade[/url]
An upgrade for the dairy goods side of the Hearthfire DLC.
author: berticus0001
